parameter.name: LocalSqlServer-Web.config Connection String
parameter.description: LocalSqlServer Connection String used in web.config by the application to access the database.
parameter.defaultvalue: Data Source=localhost; Initial Catalog=FeedbackSafeDB; Persist Security Info=True;User ID=sa;Password=bigbucks

parameter.name: FeedBackSalesDB-Web.config Connection String
parameter.description: FeedBackSalesDB Connection String used in web.config by the application to access the database.
parameter.defaultvalue: Data Source=localhost; Initial Catalog=FeedbackSalesDB; Persist Security Info=True;User ID=sa;Password=bigbucks
